From: 
To:'
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell/FOIA 
Date: Thu, 11 Mar 2021 15:46:56 +0000 
Me too, thanks. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Mar 11, 2021, at 10:43 AM, 
Good for me. 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, March 11, 2021 10:42 AM 
To: >; 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell/FOIA 
> 
wrote: 
Would 3:30 work? 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, March 11, 2021 10:38 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell/FOIA 
>; 
HiMand 
Would it be possible to schedule a call to discuss this? We spoke with the civil AUSA on the Radar Online case today, so 
we have updates on that as well. 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, March 11, 2021 9:15 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell/FOIA 
Thanks, On the plus side, it would appear that all of these are recent and pertain (in general terms) to the 
Epstein investigation we all did and that you are intimately familiar with. Do we have a way of compiling a list of the 
requests made to Civ Div and handled by them? They must have a FOIA coordinator or something like that... 
EFTA00025213

From: 
Sent: Wednesday, March 10, 2021 5:56 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: FW: Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell/FOIA 
>; 
FYI...is list has about sixteen cases. I've askeclMto check his records to see if there are more. When we have the 
full list, and I will check in with you to see where we should go from here. Two things to note for now: 
•  One of these FOIA requests is from Boies Schiller, and the log notes that BSF has made multiple requests, 
including to other districts. 
•  This list only includes FOIA requests directed to our office. It does not include FOIA lawsuits our civil division has 
handled, based on FOIA requests to other governmental components (for example, the Radar Online case 
referenced in Maxwell's letter). 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, March 10, 2021 5:23 PM 
C 
To:
c: 
Subject: RE: Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell/FOIA 
As we just discussed: 
Here is what we have in our FOIA tracking database regarding Epstein FOlAs. 
And also attached is the letter in PPI about discovery vs FOIA (seep. 8) 
From: 
Sent: Wednesda March 10, 2021 5:20 PM 
To 
Cc 
Subject: Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell/FOIA 
Hi Darian, 
> 
Hope you're doing well. andlMland I are trying to assemble a list of every FOIA request our office has ever 
received (at any point) relating to Jeffrey Epstein and/or Ghislaine Maxwell. suggested that you'd be the 
best point of contact to help us figure this out. Could you please send us the following information: 
•  A list of all FOIA requests our office has received; 
•  For each case, whether a production was made in response to the request; and 
•  Who the AUSA point of contact for the request is. 
That would be a big help. Please let us know if you need any information from us to run the search. 
Thanks very much, 
EFTA00025214

Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
New York, NY 
10007 
EFTA00025215
